title: LINK
contents:
Virtual Reality Undergraduate Project Laboratories                About      News         Members         Projects      Feedback      Contact      Links        News   <April 25, 2005>   Holodeck team welcomes Dan Benton as Lead Network programmer.  Holodeck cleaned and refined more, Physics in place and working, Finalizing for Beta Release 1.0b  Half-Life 2 SDK engine proves promising, Leads Brendan and Josh simulate deadly accidents.  Interested in joining? Contact jbell@uic.edu and 
								let us know.   <February 25, 2005>   Holodeck team welcomes Eric Gesell as Lead Physics programmer.  Still looking for more members to replace our Graduating seniors.  Holodeck cleaned and refined, looking forward to beta release by May.  Experimenting with Half-Life 2 SDK engine to simulate Laboratory accidents.  Interested in joining? Contact jbell@uic.edu and 
								let us know.   <September 26, 2004>   Logo and webpage redesigned by Maksim Fridberg and Mark Tulewicz.  Holodeck project continues and plans are made to bring on new members to help 
								the project develop new features.
